Really excited about Anything Max ‚Äî the full-stack autonomous debugging and those $10‚Äì40 K revenue stories are absolutely wild.

One small thing: $199/mo with no-trial jump feels brutal when Lovable has a real free tier (unlimited public projects, GitHub sync) and paid starts at just $25/mo. 
Most builders live in Lovable‚Äôs free/Pro world before they‚Äôre ready to go 8√ó on price. 

Two quick ideas that would make Max irresistible: 
A proper 7‚Äì14 day trial (even 5‚Äì10 full builds, then watermarked or paused)
Or a lightweight free tier - say 3 production-ready deploys/month, slower queue, Anything branding  - so we can actually ship something real and feel the magic before paying.

Give us a taste ‚Üí watch the ‚Äúthis looks insane‚Äù crowd turn into paying users overnight.
